attributes.action: Stop 2021 exams because of the 5 months of school cancelled.
attributes.additional_details:
I want the Government to do this because it neccessarily isnt us that is going to be leading the future generation. We need to help the future generation instead of throwing some of them under the bus for something that wasnt their fault.
We should be guiding them. I believe that they have potential. The 2020 exams were cancelled because of those months and i think that the 2021 exams should be too because the kids could have missed some vital information over the past few months.
attributes.background: 5 months of school have been missed and people who have gone from year 10 to year 11 have missed out 5 months of GCSE maths, which starts starting at year 7 and 5 months of every other subject, making the exams easier will not do because tge problem is that kids have missed 5 months worth of help

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petition:

Cancel GCSEs and A Levels in 2021
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/326066
